lyrics_abstract:
Boom, boom, boom

Ready for action, nip it in the bud
We never relaxin', Outkast is everlastin'
Not clashin', not at all
But see my nigga went to do a li'l actin'

Now that's for anyone askin', gimme one, pass 'em
Drip, drip, drop, there goes an eargasm
Now you cummin' out the side of ya face
We tappin' right into ya memory banks, thanks

So click-it or ticket, let's see your se[...]
